dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:rana
dialogue.text: yea! y are u so smiling so much?

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:rana
dialogue.text: did u get to eat a yummy cake today? or did u see a cute puppy? if so where is it? i wanna see!

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:alex
dialogue.text: *sigh* Rana, what are you talking about? He's not smiling, that's just his beard.

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:rana
dialogue.text: whaaa? nooo ur lyingg he's just got a big ol' smile ^_^

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:alex
dialogue.text: Rana, be real... it's a beard, just look at it.

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:alex
dialogue.text: It IS a beard... r-right Steve?

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:steve
dialogue.text: Eh, It's whatever you want it to be!

dialogue.speaker: mcrpg:alex
dialogue.text: WHAT KIND OF AN ANSWER IS THAT?!?!
